titleStmt.title: An order, whych a prince in battayll muste obserue, and kepe, yf he entende to subdewe, or passe thoroughe his enemyes landes

publicationStmt.publisher: In saynt Andrews paryshe besyde Baynards castell by Thomas Raynold and Wylliam Hyll],

notesStmt.note: Based on the De re militari of Flavius Vegetius Renatus--Cf. STC.
Imprint from colophon; conjectured publication date from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
